metadata.description: The friendly name for the workbook that is used in the Gallery or Saved List.  This name must be unique within a resource group.
The gallery that the workbook will been shown under. Supported values include workbook, tsg, etc. Usually, this is 'workbook'
The id of resource instance to which the workbook will be associated
The unique guid for this workbook instance

content.json:
# Jumpstart ArcBox Workbook for DevOps

Keep track of your ArcBox resources by selecting one of the tabs below:
____________________________________________________________________________________________________

## Jumpstart ArcBox Metrics and Alerts

ðŸ’¡ Select your Azure ArcBox subscription and Resource Group to see more information.

parameters.name: ResourceGroups
parameters.label: Resource groups
parameters.query:
Resources
| summarize by resourceGroup
| order by resourceGroup asc
| project id=resourceGroup, resourceGroup

parameters.name: ResourceTypes
parameters.label: Resource types
parameters.query:
where "*" in ({ResourceGroups}) or resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroups})
| summarize by type
| project type, label=type

parameters.name: Resources
parameters.query:
Resources
| where "*" in ({ResourceTypes}) or type in~({ResourceTypes})
| where '*' in~({ResourceGroups}) or resourceGroup in~({ResourceGroups}) 
| order by name asc
| extend Rank = row_number()
| project value = id, label = name, selected = Rank <= 10, group = resourceGroup

content.query:
AlertsManagementResources | where type =~ 'microsoft.alertsmanagement/alerts'
| where todatetime(properties.essentials.startDateTime) {timeRange}  
| where "*" in ({ResourceGroups}) or properties.essentials.targetResourceGroup in~ ({ResourceGroups})
| where "*" in ({ResourceTypes}) or properties.essentials.targetResourceType in~ ({ResourceTypes})
| where "*" in ({Resources}) or properties.essentials.targetResource in~ ({Resources})
| extend State=tostring(properties.essentials.alertState)
| where "*" in ({State}) or State in ({State})
| summarize Count=count(), New=countif(State=="New"), 
Acknowledged=countif(State=="Acknowledged"), 
Closed=countif(State=="Closed") 
by Severity=tostring(properties.essentials.severity)
| order by Severity asc
content.title: Alert Summary

parameters.name: LoganalyticWorkspace
parameters.label: Log Analytics Workspace
parameters.query:
resources
| where type contains 'microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces'
| project id

parameters.name: clusterIdWhereClause
parameters.description: Add to queries to filter by cluster id

parameters.name: workloadType
parameters.label: Workload Type
parameters.query:
KubePodInventory
{clusterIdWhereClause}
| distinct ControllerKind
| where isempty(ControllerKind) == false
| order by ControllerKind asc

criteriaData.condition: if (workloadType is not empty ), result = '| where ControllerKind in ({workloadType})'

parameters.name: namespace
parameters.label: Namespace

criteriaData.condition: if (namespace is not empty ), result = '| where Namespace in ({namespace})'

parameters.name: workloadName
parameters.label: Workload Name
parameters.description: Filter the data for a particular workload

parameters.name: podStatus
parameters.label: Pod Status
parameters.description: Filter by Pod status like Pending/Running/Failed etc.
parameters.query:
KubePodInventory
{clusterIdWhereClause}
| where ControllerName == '{workloadName}'
| distinct PodStatus
| where isnotempty(PodStatus)
| order by PodStatus asc

parameters.name: podName
parameters.label: Pod Name
parameters.query:
KubePodInventory
{clusterIdWhereClause}
| where ControllerName == '{workloadName:value}'
{podStatusWhereClause}
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, PodStatus) by Name
| project Name
| where isempty(Name) == false
| order by Name asc

criteriaData.condition: if (podName is not empty ), result = '| where PodName in ({podName})'

parameters.name: workloadNamespaceText
parameters.description: For displaying name space of the selected workload

parameters.name: workloadTypeText
parameters.description: For displaying workload type of the selected workload

content.title: Azure Arc enabled kubernetes - Pod Restart Trend

Azure Arc enabled kubernetes - Pod Count
Azure Arc enabled Kubernetes - Pod status
Azure Arc enabled kubernetes - Container Status for Pods
Azure Arc enabled kubernetes cluster - Node CPU usage %

content.json:
## Jumpstart ArcBox resource inventory

ðŸ’¡ Select your Azure ArcBox subscription and Resource Group to see more information.

parameters.name: ResourceGroup
parameters.label: Resource Group
parameters.query:
Resources
| summarize Count = count() by subscriptionId, resourceGroup
| order by Count desc
| extend Rank = row_number()
| project label = resourceGroup

content.query:
Resources 
| where resourceGroup == "{ResourceGroup}"
| extend type = case(
type contains 'microsoft.netapp/netappaccounts', 'NetApp Accounts',
type contains "microsoft.compute", "Azure Compute",
type contains "microsoft.logic", "LogicApps",
type contains 'microsoft.keyvault/vaults', "Key Vaults",

type contains 'microsoft.desktopvirtualization/applicationgroups', 'WVD Application Groups',
type contains 'microsoft.desktopvirtualization/workspaces', 'WVD Workspaces',
type contains 'microsoft.desktopvirtualization/hostpools', 'WVD Hostpools',
type contains 'microsoft.recoveryservices/vaults', 'Backup Vaults',
type contains 'microsoft.web', 'App Services',

type contains 'sendgrid.email/accounts', 'SendGrid Accounts',
type contains 'microsoft.datafactory/factories', 'Data Factory',
type contains 'microsoft.databricks/workspaces', 'Databricks Workspaces',
type contains 'microsoft.machinelearningservices/workspaces', 'Machine Learnings Workspaces',
type contains 'microsoft.alertsmanagement/smartdetectoralertrules', 'Azure Monitor Resources',
type contains 'microsoft.apimanagement/service', 'API Management Services',
type contains 'microsoft.dbforpostgresql', 'PostgreSQL Resources',
type contains 'microsoft.scheduler/jobcollections', 'Scheduler Job Collections',
type contains 'microsoft.visualstudio/account', 'Azure DevOps Organization',

type contains 'microsoft.devices','IoT Resources',
type contains 'microsoft.datamigration', 'Data Migraiton Services',
type contains 'microsoft.cognitiveservices', 'Congitive Services',
type contains 'microsoft.customproviders', 'Custom Providers',
type contains 'microsoft.appconfiguration', 'App Services',
type contains 'microsoft.search', 'Search Services',
type contains 'microsoft.maps', 'Maps',
type contains 'microsoft.containerservice/managedclusters', 'AKS',
type contains 'microsoft.signalrservice', 'SignalR',

type contains 'microsoft.synapse/workspaces/sqlpools', 'Synapse SQL Pools',

content.title: Resource Count by Type

items.name: query - Overview Resource Counts by type

content.query:
Resources
| where type in~ ({ResourceType})
| where resourceGroup == "{ResourceGroup}"
| project Resource = id, Subscription = subscriptionId, ['Resource group'] = strcat('/subscriptions/', subscriptionId, '/resourceGroups/', resourceGroup), Location = location, tags
content.title: Resources List

content.json:
ðŸ’¡ To use this workbook, you'll need to configure **continuous export** to export data to a Log Analytics workspace:
1. From Microsoft Defender for Cloud's sidebar, select **Environment Settings**.
2. Select the specific Azure subscription for which you want to configure the data export.
3. From the sidebar of the settings page for that subscription, select **Continuous Export**.
4. Set the export target to **Log Analytics workspace**.
5. Select the following data types: **Security recommendations** and **Secure Score (Preview)**.
6. From the export frequency options, select **Streaming** and **Snapshots**.
7. Make sure to select ArcBox's subscription, resource group and Log Analytics workspace as the export target. Select Save.

[Learn more](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/security-center/continuous-export?tabs=azure-portal#set-up-a-continuous-export)

> **Notes**
* To get full visibility, wait at least one week for the first snapshot to be exported.
* To configure continuous export across your organization, use the supplied Azure Policy 'DeployIfNotExist' policies described [here](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/security-center/continuous-export?tabs=azure-policy#set-up-a-continuous-export).

parameters.name: Workspace
parameters.description: Select at least one workspace that contains continuous export data based on the selected subscriptions

parameters.name: TimeRange
parameters.label: Time Range
parameters.description: Filter the data of this report to one of these predefined time ranges

parameters.name: ErrorHandle

content.noDataMessage: No data available. Check your continuous export configuration for the selected workspaces.

content.query:
//Aggregated score for all subscriptions over time
SecureScores
| where '{selectedSubscription}' == 'All' or SecureScoresSubscriptionId == '{selectedSubscription}'
| where MaxScore>0
| extend subscriptionScore = CurrentScore/MaxScore 
| extend subScoreXsubWeight = subscriptionScore*Weight 
| extend Day = startofday(TimeGenerated) 
| summarize upperValue = sum(subScoreXsubWeight), underValue = sum(todouble(Weight)) by Day
| extend OverallScore = 100*((upperValue)/(underValue))
| project OverallScore, Day
content.noDataMessage: No data available. Check your continuous export configuration for the selected workspaces.

content.json:
Top recommendations with recent increase in unhealthy resources
       Recommendations with the most resources that have become unhealthy in the periods shown

content.query:
//Top recommendations with recent increase in unhealthy resources
SecurityRecommendation
| extend SubscriptionId = iff(AssessedResourceId=="N/A", split(url_decode(RecommendationLink),'/')[9], split(AssessedResourceId, '/')[2])
| where '{selectedSubscription}' == 'All' or SubscriptionId == '{selectedSubscription}'
| where RecommendationState  =~ "Unhealthy"
| summarize UnhealthyAssessedResources = dcount(AssessedResourceId),RecommendationName = any(RecommendationName) by RecommendationId
| project  RecommendationName, UnhealthyAssessedResources
| sort by UnhealthyAssessedResources desc
| take 10
content.noDataMessage: No data available. Check your continuous export configuration for the selected workspaces.

content.query:
//Security controls score over time (weekly) 
let subscriptionsWeight = 
    SecureScores
    | where '{selectedSubscription}' == 'All' or SecureScoresSubscriptionId == '{selectedSubscription}'
    | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by SecureScoresSubscriptionId 
    | project SecureScoresSubscriptionId, SubscriptionWeight = Weight; 
SecureScoreControls 
| where MaxScore > 0
| where IsSnapshot == true
| extend Week = startofweek(TimeGenerated) 
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by SecureScoresSubscriptionId, ControlId, Week 
| join kind=inner(
    subscriptionsWeight
  ) on SecureScoresSubscriptionId 
| extend WeightedControlScore = PercentageScore * SubscriptionWeight 
| summarize WeightedScoreAvg = sum(WeightedControlScore)/sum(SubscriptionWeight)*100, ControlName = any(ControlName) by ControlId, Week
| order by WeightedScoreAvg desc
content.noDataMessage: No data available. Check your continuous export configuration for the selected workspaces.

content.query:
//Recommendations changes over time (count how many resources have been changed to unhealthy, heathy, and not applicable, per recommendation) 
let unhealthy = SecurityRecommendation
| extend SubscriptionId = iff(AssessedResourceId=="N/A", split(url_decode(RecommendationLink),'/')[9], split(AssessedResourceId, '/')[2])
| where '{selectedSubscription}' == 'All' or SubscriptionId == '{selectedSubscription}'
| where RecommendationState == 'Unhealthy'
| where isnotempty(RecommendationId) and isnotempty(RecommendationName) 
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by RecommendationId, AssessedResourceId;
let healthy = SecurityRecommendation
| extend SubscriptionId = iff(AssessedResourceId=="N/A", split(url_decode(RecommendationLink),'/')[9], split(AssessedResourceId, '/')[2])
| where '{selectedSubscription}' == 'All' or SubscriptionId == '{selectedSubscription}'
| where RecommendationState == 'Healthy' 
| where isnotempty(RecommendationId) and isnotempty(RecommendationName) 
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by RecommendationId, AssessedResourceId;
let notApplicable = SecurityRecommendation
| extend SubscriptionId = iff(AssessedResourceId=="N/A", split(url_decode(RecommendationLink),'/')[9], split(AssessedResourceId, '/')[2])
| where '{selectedSubscription}' == 'All' or SubscriptionId == '{selectedSubscription}'
| where RecommendationState == 'NotApplicable' 
| where isnotempty(RecommendationId) and isnotempty(RecommendationName) 
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by RecommendationId, AssessedResourceId; 
let notUnhealthy = SecurityRecommendation
| extend SubscriptionId = iff(AssessedResourceId=="N/A", split(url_decode(RecommendationLink),'/')[9], split(AssessedResourceId, '/')[2])
| where '{selectedSubscription}' == 'All' or SubscriptionId == '{selectedSubscription}'
| where RecommendationState !~ 'Unhealthy' 
| where isnotempty(RecommendationId) and isnotempty(RecommendationName) 
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by RecommendationId, AssessedResourceId; 
let notHealthy = SecurityRecommendation
| extend SubscriptionId = iff(AssessedResourceId=="N/A", split(url_decode(RecommendationLink),'/')[9], split(AssessedResourceId, '/')[2])
| where '{selectedSubscription}' == 'All' or SubscriptionId == '{selectedSubscription}'
| where RecommendationState !~ 'Healthy'
| where isnotempty(RecommendationId) and isnotempty(RecommendationName) 
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by RecommendationId, AssessedResourceId; 
let notNotApplicable = SecurityRecommendation
| extend SubscriptionId = iff(AssessedResourceId=="N/A", split(url_decode(RecommendationLink),'/')[9], split(AssessedResourceId, '/')[2])
| where '{selectedSubscription}' == 'All' or SubscriptionId == '{selectedSubscription}'
| where RecommendationState !~ 'NotApplicable' 
| where isnotempty(RecommendationId) and isnotempty(RecommendationName) 
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by RecommendationId, AssessedResourceId; 
let notHealthyToHealthy =  
    notHealthy 
    | join (
        healthy
      ) on RecommendationId, AssessedResourceId 
    | where TimeGenerated < TimeGenerated1 
    | summarize ToHealthyCount = count(), RecommendationName=any(RecommendationName) by RecommendationId;
let notUnhealthyToUnhealthy =  
    notUnhealthy 
    | join ( 
        unhealthy
     ) on RecommendationId, AssessedResourceId 
    | where TimeGenerated < TimeGenerated1 
    | summarize ToUnhealthyCount = count(), RecommendationName=any(RecommendationName) by RecommendationId;
let notNotApplicableToNotApplicable =  
    notNotApplicable 
    | join (
        notApplicable
     ) on RecommendationId, AssessedResourceId 
    | where TimeGenerated < TimeGenerated1 
    | summarize ToNotApplicableCount = count(), RecommendationName=any(RecommendationName) by RecommendationId;
// Union 
union notHealthyToHealthy, notUnhealthyToUnhealthy, notNotApplicableToNotApplicable
| summarize RecommendationName=any(RecommendationName), ToUnhealthyCount = sum(ToUnhealthyCount), ToHealthyCount = sum(ToHealthyCount), ToNotApplicableCount = sum(ToNotApplicableCount) by RecommendationId
| order by ToUnhealthyCount desc
content.noDataMessage: No data available. Check your continuous export configuration for the selected workspaces.

content.json: To view changes over time on a specific recommendation, please select any from the list above.

content.query:
let unhealthy = SecurityRecommendation
| extend SubscriptionId = iff(AssessedResourceId=="N/A", split(url_decode(RecommendationLink),'/')[9], split(AssessedResourceId, '/')[2])
| where '{selectedSubscription}' == 'All' or SubscriptionId == '{selectedSubscription}'
| where RecommendationState == 'Unhealthy'
| where isnotempty(RecommendationId) and isnotempty(RecommendationName)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by RecommendationId, AssessedResourceId
| project UnhealthyRecommendationId = RecommendationId, UnhealthyResourceId = AssessedResourceId, UnhealhyTime =  TimeGenerated, tostring(SubscriptionId);
let notApplicable = SecurityRecommendation
| extend SubscriptionId = iff(AssessedResourceId=="N/A", split(url_decode(RecommendationLink),'/')[9], split(AssessedResourceId, '/')[2])
| where '{selectedSubscription}' == 'All' or SubscriptionId == '{selectedSubscription}'
| where RecommendationState == 'NotApplicable'
| where isnotempty(RecommendationId) and isnotempty(RecommendationName)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by RecommendationId, AssessedResourceId
| project NARecommendationId = RecommendationId, NAResourceId = AssessedResourceId, NATime =  TimeGenerated, tostring(SubscriptionId);
let healthy = SecurityRecommendation
| extend SubscriptionId = iff(AssessedResourceId=="N/A", split(url_decode(RecommendationLink),'/')[9], split(AssessedResourceId, '/')[2])
| where '{selectedSubscription}' == 'All' or SubscriptionId == '{selectedSubscription}'
| where RecommendationState == 'Healthy'
| where isnotempty(RecommendationId) and isnotempty(RecommendationName)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by RecommendationId, AssessedResourceId
| project HealthyRecommendationId = RecommendationId, HealthyResourceId = AssessedResourceId, HealhyTime =  TimeGenerated, tostring(SubscriptionId);
let NotHealthy = SecurityRecommendation
| extend SubscriptionId = iff(AssessedResourceId=="N/A", split(url_decode(RecommendationLink),'/')[9], split(AssessedResourceId, '/')[2])
| where '{selectedSubscription}' == 'All' or SubscriptionId == '{selectedSubscription}'
| where RecommendationState !~ 'Healthy'
| where isnotempty(RecommendationId) and isnotempty(RecommendationName)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by RecommendationId, AssessedResourceId;
let NotUnhealthy = SecurityRecommendation
| extend SubscriptionId = iff(AssessedResourceId=="N/A", split(url_decode(RecommendationLink),'/')[9], split(AssessedResourceId, '/')[2])
| where '{selectedSubscription}' == 'All' or SubscriptionId == '{selectedSubscription}'
| where RecommendationState !~ 'Unhealthy'
| where isnotempty(RecommendationId) and isnotempty(RecommendationName)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by RecommendationId, AssessedResourceId;
let NotNotApplicable = SecurityRecommendation
| extend SubscriptionId = iff(AssessedResourceId=="N/A", split(url_decode(RecommendationLink),'/')[9], split(AssessedResourceId, '/')[2])
| where '{selectedSubscription}' == 'All' or SubscriptionId == '{selectedSubscription}'
| where RecommendationState !~ 'NotApplicable'
| where isnotempty(RecommendationId) and isnotempty(RecommendationName)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by RecommendationId, AssessedResourceId;
let 1_to_Healthy = 
    NotHealthy
    | extend orignalState = RecommendationState
    | join healthy on $left.RecommendationId == $right.HealthyRecommendationId, $left.AssessedResourceId == $right.HealthyResourceId
    | where TimeGenerated < HealhyTime
    | extend update = "To healthy"
    | project RecommendationId, RecommendationName, Description, OriginalState = RecommendationState, update, TimeGenerated, RecommendationSeverity, tostring(SubscriptionId), AssessedResourceId, RecommendationLink;
//1_to_Healthy
let 2_to_Unhealthy = 
    NotUnhealthy
    | extend orignalState = RecommendationState
    | join unhealthy on $left.RecommendationId == $right.UnhealthyRecommendationId, $left.AssessedResourceId == $right.UnhealthyResourceId
    | where TimeGenerated < UnhealhyTime
    | extend update = "To unhealthy"
    | project RecommendationId, RecommendationName, Description, OriginalState = RecommendationState, update, TimeGenerated, RecommendationSeverity, tostring(SubscriptionId), AssessedResourceId, RecommendationLink;
//2_to_Unhealthy
let 3_to_NotApplicable = 
    NotNotApplicable
    | extend orignalState = RecommendationState
    | join notApplicable on $left.RecommendationId == $right.NARecommendationId, $left.AssessedResourceId == $right.NAResourceId
    | where TimeGenerated < NATime
    | extend update = "To not applicable"
    | extend NotApplicableReason = iff(isempty(NotApplicableReason), "NA", NotApplicableReason)
    | project RecommendationId, RecommendationName, Description, OriginalState = RecommendationState, update, TimeGenerated, RecommendationSeverity, tostring(SubscriptionId), AssessedResourceId, RecommendationLink, NotApplicableReason;
// JOIN
union 1_to_Healthy, 2_to_Unhealthy, 3_to_NotApplicable
| extend FullRecommendationLink = strcat("http://",RecommendationLink)
| extend AssessedResourceId = iff(AssessedResourceId=="N/A", extract(".*onPremiseMachines/(.+)",1, url_decode(RecommendationLink)), AssessedResourceId)
| project-away RecommendationLink
| where RecommendationId == '{RecommendationId}'
content.title: Changes for "{RecommendationName}"
content.noDataMessage: No data available. Check your continuous export configuration for the selected workspaces.

content.title: Agent Monitoring

content.json:
# Microsoft Defender for Cloud Agent Monitoring

To consider an Azure Arc enabled-server *monitored* by Azure Defender it need to meet the following criteria:
1. Have the Log Analytics agent installed
2. The Log Analytics agent needs to be reporting to its Log Analytics workspace.
3. The *Microsoft Defender for Cloud for servers* plan needs to be enabled on both, the machine's Azure subscription and the Log Analytics workspace the agent is reporting to.

This section will help you visualize machines which are protected by Azure Defender and have an agent installed, but which do not properly report to their workspace.
Please select one, several, or all Log Analytics workspaces in your environment in the drop down below, so the workbook can access relevant data to visualize.

links.linkLabel: Machines not reporting to LA workspace

content.json:
## Overview
In this section, you see the current status of all Azure VMs and Azure Arc-enabled servers connected to your subscriptions and Log Analytics workspaces as selected.

The first chart shows the Log Analytics Agent installation status as reported by Azure Security Center.
In the second chart, you see the current Log Analytics Agent reporting status of your machines. Machines that are sending current heartbeat information within the last 15 minutes are considered as *currently reporting*.
The third chart shows the status of Azure Defender for Servers across all servers that are protected by Azure Security Center.

The total number of machines in the dashboards below may vary as the Log Analytics Agent reporting status dashboard will only show machines that have been reporting within the last 30 days, whereas the other two dashboards will consider machines that are covered by Azure Defender and have an agent installed. This will include machines that have been powered off for more than 30 days but which have not been deleted.
To see more details, please select **one** value at a time from each of the charts below.

content.query:
securityresources
| where type =~ "microsoft.security/assessments" or type =~ "microsoft.security/softwareInventories"
| extend assessmentStatusCode = case(type =~ "microsoft.security/assessments", tostring(properties.status.code), "")
| extend severity = case(assessmentStatusCode =~ "unhealthy", tolower(tostring(properties.metadata.severity)), tolower(assessmentStatusCode))
| extend exemptionType = case(tolower(type) != "microsoft.security/assessments","N/A", case(properties.status.cause =~ "exempt", "Yes", "No"))
| extend source = case(type =~ "microsoft.security/assessments", tostring(properties.resourceDetails.Source), "")
| extend resourceId = trim(" ", tolower(tostring(case(source =~ "azure", properties.resourceDetails.Id,
                                                                            source =~ "aws" and isnotempty(tostring(properties.resourceDetails.ConnectorId)), properties.resourceDetails.Id,
                                                                            source =~ "aws", properties.resourceDetails.AzureResourceId,
                                                                            source =~ "gcp", properties.resourceDetails.AzureResourceId,
                                                                            type =~ "microsoft.security/assessments", extract("^(.+)/providers/Microsoft.Security/assessments/.+$",1,id),extract("^(.+)/providers/Microsoft.Security/softwareInventories/.+$",1,id)))))
| extend resourceName = iff(source =~ "aws" and isnotempty(tostring(properties.resourceDetails.ConnectorId)), tostring(properties.additionalData.ResourceName), extract(@"(.+)/(.+)", 2, resourceId))
| extend regexResourceId = extract_all(@"/providers/([^/]+)(?:/([^/]+)/[^/]+(?:/([^/]+)/[^/]+)?)?/([^/]+)/[^/]+$", resourceId)
| extend RegexResourceType = regexResourceId[0]
| extend mainType = RegexResourceType[1], extendedType = RegexResourceType[2], resourceType = RegexResourceType[3]
| extend providerName = RegexResourceType[0],
                        mainType = case(mainType !~ "", strcat("/",mainType), ""),
                        extendedType = case(extendedType!~ "", strcat("/",extendedType), ""),
                        resourceType = case(resourceType!~ "", strcat("/",resourceType), "")
| extend array = split(resourceId, '/')
| extend typeFullPath = case(
                    array_length(array) == 3, 'subscription',
                    array_length(array) == 5, 'resourcegroups',
                    source =~ "aws" and isnotempty(tostring(properties.resourceDetails.ConnectorId)), tolower(strcat(providerName, mainType, "/", tostring(properties.additionalData.ResourceProvider), tostring(properties.additionalData.ResourceType))),
                    strcat(providerName, mainType, extendedType, resourceType))
| extend resourceType = case(typeFullPath =~ 'resourcegroups' or typeFullPath =~ 'subscription', typeFullPath, tolower(trim("/", resourceType)))
| extend assessmentKey = case(type =~ "microsoft.security/assessments", tostring(name), "")
| extend softwareVendorName = case(type =~ "microsoft.security/softwareInventories", tostring(properties.vendor), "")
| extend softwareName = case(type =~ "microsoft.security/softwareInventories", tostring(properties.softwareName), "")
| extend softwareVersion = case(type =~ "microsoft.security/softwareInventories", tostring(properties.version), "")
| extend softwareNameIdentifier = case(type =~ "microsoft.security/softwareInventories", strcat(softwareVendorName, ",", softwareName, ",", softwareVersion), "")
| extend environment = case(type =~ "microsoft.security/assessments", properties.resourceDetails["Source"], "")
| extend environment = case(environment =~ "onpremise", tolower("Non-Azure"), tolower(environment))
| extend osTypeProperty = properties.additionalData["OS Type"]
| extend osType = case(isnotempty(osTypeProperty), osTypeProperty, "")
| extend hasAgent = case(assessmentKey == "d1db3318-01ff-16de-29eb-28b344515626" or assessmentKey == "45cfe080-ceb1-a91e-9743-71551ed24e94" or assessmentKey == "720a3e77-0b9a-4fa9-98b6-ddf0fd7e32c1" or assessmentKey == "27ac71b1-75c5-41c2-adc2-858f5db45b08", assessmentStatusCode, "")
| extend hasAgent = case(assessmentKey == "4ab6e3c5-74dd-8b35-9ab9-f61b30875b27" or assessmentKey == "181ac480-f7c4-544b-9865-11b8ffe87f47" or assessmentKey == "4fb67663-9ab9-475d-b026-8c544cced439" , "healthy", hasAgent)
| extend workspaceAzureResourceId = case(hasAgent !~ "", properties.additionalData["Reporting workspace azure id"], "")
| extend workspaceName = case(workspaceAzureResourceId !~ "", extract(@"(.+)/(.+)", 2, workspaceAzureResourceId), "")
| extend assessmentDisplayName = case(type =~ "microsoft.security/assessments", case(isnotempty(properties.displayName), properties.displayName, properties.metadata.displayName), "")
| extend assessmentIdentifier = case(type =~ "microsoft.security/assessments", strcat(assessmentKey, "," , assessmentDisplayName, ",", severity), "")
| summarize assessmentsCount = count() , assessmentsIdentifier = make_list(assessmentIdentifier), softwareNamesIdentifier = make_list(softwareNameIdentifier), hasAgent = max(hasAgent), workspaceName = max(workspaceName), environment = max(environment), osType = max(osType), exemptionType = max(exemptionType)  by resourceId, subscriptionId, resourceName, resourceType, typeFullPath, severity
| extend packAssessments = pack(severity, assessmentsCount)
| summarize assessmentsSummary = make_bag(packAssessments), assessmentsIdentifier = make_set(assessmentsIdentifier), softwareNamesIdentifier = make_set(softwareNamesIdentifier), hasAgent = max(hasAgent), workspaceName= max(workspaceName), environment = max(environment), osType= max(osType), exemptionType = max(exemptionType)  by resourceId, subscriptionId, resourceName, resourceType, typeFullPath
| extend agentMonitoring = case(hasAgent =~ "NotApplicable" or hasAgent =~ "", '',
                                                hasAgent =~ "Unhealthy", "notInstalled",
                                                "installed")
| join kind=leftouter (
                    securityresources
                    | where type =~ "microsoft.security/pricings"
                    | project subscriptionId, bundleName = tolower(name), freeTrialRemainingTime = properties.freeTrialRemainingTime, pricingTier = tolower(properties.pricingTier)
                    | extend bundlesPricing = pack(bundleName, pricingTier)
                    | summarize subscriptionPricing = make_bag(bundlesPricing) by subscriptionId
                ) on subscriptionId
| extend hasNoSoftwareData = case(array_length(softwareNamesIdentifier) == 1, case(set_has_element(softwareNamesIdentifier, ""), true, false), false)
| extend softwareNamesIdentifier = case(hasNoSoftwareData, softwareNamesIdentifier, set_difference(softwareNamesIdentifier, pack_array("")))
| extend AssessmentsHigh = case(isnull(assessmentsSummary.high), 0 , toint(assessmentsSummary.high))
| extend AssessmentsMedium = case(isnull(assessmentsSummary.medium), 0 , toint(assessmentsSummary.medium))
| extend AssessmentsLow = case(isnull(assessmentsSummary.low), 0 , toint(assessmentsSummary.low))
| extend unhealthyAssessmentsCount = AssessmentsHigh + AssessmentsMedium + AssessmentsLow
| extend virtualmachines = case(isnull(subscriptionPricing), '' , subscriptionPricing.virtualmachines)
| extend virtualmachines = case(virtualmachines == 'free', 'off', 'on')
| extend sqlservers = case(isnull(subscriptionPricing), '' , subscriptionPricing.sqlservers)
| extend sqlservers = case(sqlservers == 'free', 'off', 'on')
| extend kubernetesservice = case(isnull(subscriptionPricing), '' , subscriptionPricing.kubernetesservice)
| extend kubernetesservice = case(kubernetesservice == 'free', 'off', 'on')
| extend containerregistry = case(isnull(subscriptionPricing), '' , subscriptionPricing.containerregistry)
| extend containerregistry = case(containerregistry == 'free', 'off', 'on')
| extend connectedcontainerregistry = case(isnull(subscriptionPricing), '' , subscriptionPricing.connectedcontainerregistry)
| extend connectedcontainerregistry = case(connectedcontainerregistry == 'free', 'off', 'on')
| extend sqlservervirtualmachines = case(isnull(subscriptionPricing), '' , subscriptionPricing.sqlservervirtualmachines)
| extend sqlservervirtualmachines = case(sqlservervirtualmachines == 'free', 'off', 'on')
| extend appservices = case(isnull(subscriptionPricing), '' , subscriptionPricing.appservices)
| extend appservices = case(appservices == 'free', 'off', 'on')
| extend storageaccounts = case(isnull(subscriptionPricing), '' , subscriptionPricing.storageaccounts)
| extend storageaccounts = case(storageaccounts == 'free', 'off', 'on')
| extend keyvaults = case(isnull(subscriptionPricing), '' , subscriptionPricing.keyvaults)
| extend keyvaults = case(keyvaults == 'free', 'off', 'on')
| extend opensourcerelationaldatabases = case(isnull(subscriptionPricing), '' , subscriptionPricing.opensourcerelationaldatabases)
| extend opensourcerelationaldatabases = case(opensourcerelationaldatabases == 'free', 'off', 'on')
| extend calculatedSubscriptionPricing = case(resourceType =~ "subscription" and isempty(subscriptionPricing) == false , iff(subscriptionPricing has "free" and subscriptionPricing has "standard", "partial", iff(subscriptionPricing has "free", "off", "on")), "")
| extend resourcePricing = case(typeFullPath =~ "microsoft.classiccompute/virtualmachines", virtualmachines, typeFullPath =~ "microsoft.compute/virtualmachines", virtualmachines, typeFullPath =~ "microsoft.hybridcompute/machines", virtualmachines, typeFullPath =~ "microsoft.sql/servers", sqlservers, typeFullPath =~ "microsoft.containerservice/managedclusters", kubernetesservice, typeFullPath =~ "microsoft.kubernetes/connectedclusters", kubernetesservice, typeFullPath =~ "microsoft.containerregistry/registries", containerregistry, typeFullPath =~ "microsoft.security/connectedcontainerregistries", connectedcontainerregistry, typeFullPath =~ "microsoft.sqlvirtualmachine/sqlvirtualmachines", sqlservervirtualmachines, typeFullPath =~ "microsoft.web/sites", appservices, typeFullPath =~ "microsoft.storage/storageaccounts", storageaccounts, typeFullPath =~ "microsoft.compute/virtualmachinescalesets", virtualmachines, typeFullPath =~ "microsoft.keyvault/vaults", keyvaults, typeFullPath =~ "microsoft.dbforpostgresql/servers", opensourcerelationaldatabases, typeFullPath =~ "microsoft.dbformysql/servers", opensourcerelationaldatabases, typeFullPath =~ "microsoft.dbformariadb/servers", opensourcerelationaldatabases, calculatedSubscriptionPricing)
| extend pricing = case(resourceType =~ "subscription" , calculatedSubscriptionPricing , resourcePricing)
| extend selectedSoftware = ""
| project resourceType, exemptionType, typeFullPath, resourceId, resourceName, subscriptionId, environment, osType, workspaceName, agentMonitoring, assessmentsIdentifier, assessmentsSummary, subscriptionPricing, unhealthyAssessmentsCount, pricing, softwareNamesIdentifier, selectedSoftware
| extend resourceGroup = tolower(tostring(split(resourceId, "/")[4]))
| order by unhealthyAssessmentsCount, subscriptionId, resourceType, resourceId
| where typeFullPath in ('microsoft.compute/virtualmachines', 'microsoft.hybridcompute/machines')
| where isnotempty(resourceId)
| summarize dcount(resourceId) by agentMonitoring
content.title: Log Analytics Agent installation status

content.query:
Heartbeat
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, SubscriptionId) by tolower(ResourceId)
| extend LastSeen = case(TimeGenerated > now(-15m), "currently reporting",
                        TimeGenerated < now(-15m) and TimeGenerated > now(-24h), "not reporting for > 15 min",
                        TimeGenerated < now(-24h) and TimeGenerated > now(-48h), "not reporting for > 24 hours",
                        TimeGenerated < now(-48h) and TimeGenerated > now(-3d), "not reporting for > 48 hours",
                        TimeGenerated < now(-3d) and TimeGenerated > now(-7d), "not reporting for > 3 days",
                        TimeGenerated < now(-7d) and TimeGenerated > now(-30d), "not reporting for > 7 days",
                        "failed")
| order by TimeGenerated
| summarize NotReportingSince = count() by LastSeen
content.title: Log Analytics Agent reporting status

content.query:
securityresources
| where type =~ "microsoft.security/assessments" or type =~ "microsoft.security/softwareInventories"
| extend assessmentStatusCode = case(type =~ "microsoft.security/assessments", tostring(properties.status.code), "")
| extend severity = case(assessmentStatusCode =~ "unhealthy", tolower(tostring(properties.metadata.severity)), tolower(assessmentStatusCode))
| extend exemptionType = case(tolower(type) != "microsoft.security/assessments","N/A", case(properties.status.cause =~ "exempt", "Yes", "No"))
| extend source = case(type =~ "microsoft.security/assessments", tostring(properties.resourceDetails.Source), "")
| extend resourceId = trim(" ", tolower(tostring(case(source =~ "azure", properties.resourceDetails.Id,
                                                                            source =~ "aws" and isnotempty(tostring(properties.resourceDetails.ConnectorId)), properties.resourceDetails.Id,
                                                                            source =~ "aws", properties.resourceDetails.AzureResourceId,
                                                                            source =~ "gcp", properties.resourceDetails.AzureResourceId,
                                                                            type =~ "microsoft.security/assessments", extract("^(.+)/providers/Microsoft.Security/assessments/.+$",1,id),extract("^(.+)/providers/Microsoft.Security/softwareInventories/.+$",1,id)))))
| extend resourceName = iff(source =~ "aws" and isnotempty(tostring(properties.resourceDetails.ConnectorId)), tostring(properties.additionalData.ResourceName), extract(@"(.+)/(.+)", 2, resourceId))
| extend regexResourceId = extract_all(@"/providers/([^/]+)(?:/([^/]+)/[^/]+(?:/([^/]+)/[^/]+)?)?/([^/]+)/[^/]+$", resourceId)
| extend RegexResourceType = regexResourceId[0]
| extend mainType = RegexResourceType[1], extendedType = RegexResourceType[2], resourceType = RegexResourceType[3]
| extend providerName = RegexResourceType[0],
                        mainType = case(mainType !~ "", strcat("/",mainType), ""),
                        extendedType = case(extendedType!~ "", strcat("/",extendedType), ""),
                        resourceType = case(resourceType!~ "", strcat("/",resourceType), "")
| extend array = split(resourceId, '/')
| extend typeFullPath = case(
                    array_length(array) == 3, 'subscription',
                    array_length(array) == 5, 'resourcegroups',

                    strcat(providerName, mainType, extendedType, resourceType))
| extend resourceType = case(typeFullPath =~ 'resourcegroups' or typeFullPath =~ 'subscription', typeFullPath, tolower(trim("/", resourceType)))
| extend assessmentKey = case(type =~ "microsoft.security/assessments", tostring(name), "")

| extend environment = case(type =~ "microsoft.security/assessments", properties.resourceDetails["Source"], "")
| extend environment = case(environment =~ "onpremise", tolower("Non-Azure"), tolower(environment))
| extend osTypeProperty = properties.additionalData["OS Type"]
| extend osType = case(isnotempty(osTypeProperty), osTypeProperty, "")
| extend hasAgent = case(assessmentKey == "d1db3318-01ff-16de-29eb-28b344515626" or assessmentKey == "45cfe080-ceb1-a91e-9743-71551ed24e94" or assessmentKey == "720a3e77-0b9a-4fa9-98b6-ddf0fd7e32c1" or assessmentKey == "27ac71b1-75c5-41c2-adc2-858f5db45b08", assessmentStatusCode, "")
| extend hasAgent = case(assessmentKey == "4ab6e3c5-74dd-8b35-9ab9-f61b30875b27" or assessmentKey == "181ac480-f7c4-544b-9865-11b8ffe87f47" or assessmentKey == "4fb67663-9ab9-475d-b026-8c544cced439" , "healthy", hasAgent)
| extend workspaceAzureResourceId = case(hasAgent !~ "", properties.additionalData["Reporting workspace azure id"], "")
| extend workspaceName = case(workspaceAzureResourceId !~ "", extract(@"(.+)/(.+)", 2, workspaceAzureResourceId), "")
| extend assessmentDisplayName = case(type =~ "microsoft.security/assessments", case(isnotempty(properties.displayName), properties.displayName, properties.metadata.displayName), "")
| extend assessmentIdentifier = case(type =~ "microsoft.security/assessments", strcat(assessmentKey, "," , assessmentDisplayName, ",", severity), "")
| summarize assessmentsCount = count() , assessmentsIdentifier = make_list(assessmentIdentifier), softwareNamesIdentifier = make_list(softwareNameIdentifier), hasAgent = max(hasAgent), workspaceName = max(workspaceName), environment = max(environment), osType = max(osType), exemptionType = max(exemptionType)  by resourceId, subscriptionId, resourceName, resourceType, typeFullPath, severity
| extend packAssessments = pack(severity, assessmentsCount)

                                                hasAgent =~ "Unhealthy", "notInstalled",
                                                "installed")
| join kind=leftouter (
                    securityresources
                    | where type =~ "microsoft.security/pricings"
                    | project subscriptionId, bundleName = tolower(name), freeTrialRemainingTime = properties.freeTrialRemainingTime, pricingTier = tolower(properties.pricingTier)
                    | extend bundlesPricing = pack(bundleName, pricingTier)
                    | summarize subscriptionPricing = make_bag(bundlesPricing) by subscriptionId
                ) on subscriptionId

| extend softwareNamesIdentifier = case(hasNoSoftwareData, softwareNamesIdentifier, set_difference(softwareNamesIdentifier, pack_array("")))
| extend AssessmentsHigh = case(isnull(assessmentsSummary.high), 0 , toint(assessmentsSummary.high))
| extend AssessmentsMedium = case(isnull(assessmentsSummary.medium), 0 , toint(assessmentsSummary.medium))
| extend AssessmentsLow = case(isnull(assessmentsSummary.low), 0 , toint(assessmentsSummary.low))
| extend unhealthyAssessmentsCount = AssessmentsHigh + AssessmentsMedium + AssessmentsLow
| extend virtualmachines = case(isnull(subscriptionPricing), '' , subscriptionPricing.virtualmachines)
| extend virtualmachines = case(virtualmachines == 'free', 'off', 'on')
| extend sqlservers = case(isnull(subscriptionPricing), '' , subscriptionPricing.sqlservers)
| extend sqlservers = case(sqlservers == 'free', 'off', 'on')

| extend kubernetesservice = case(kubernetesservice == 'free', 'off', 'on')
| extend containerregistry = case(isnull(subscriptionPricing), '' , subscriptionPricing.containerregistry)

| extend connectedcontainerregistry = case(isnull(subscriptionPricing), '' , subscriptionPricing.connectedcontainerregistry)
| extend connectedcontainerregistry = case(connectedcontainerregistry == 'free', 'off', 'on')
| extend sqlservervirtualmachines = case(isnull(subscriptionPricing), '' , subscriptionPricing.sqlservervirtualmachines)

| extend appservices = case(isnull(subscriptionPricing), '' , subscriptionPricing.appservices)
| extend appservices = case(appservices == 'free', 'off', 'on')
| extend storageaccounts = case(isnull(subscriptionPricing), '' , subscriptionPricing.storageaccounts)
| extend storageaccounts = case(storageaccounts == 'free', 'off', 'on')

| extend keyvaults = case(keyvaults == 'free', 'off', 'on')
| extend opensourcerelationaldatabases = case(isnull(subscriptionPricing), '' , subscriptionPricing.opensourcerelationaldatabases)
| extend opensourcerelationaldatabases = case(opensourcerelationaldatabases == 'free', 'off', 'on')

| extend resourcePricing = case(typeFullPath =~ "microsoft.classiccompute/virtualmachines", virtualmachines, typeFullPath =~ "microsoft.compute/virtualmachines", virtualmachines, typeFullPath =~ "microsoft.hybridcompute/machines", virtualmachines, typeFullPath =~ "microsoft.sql/servers", sqlservers, typeFullPath =~ "microsoft.containerservice/managedclusters", kubernetesservice, typeFullPath =~ "microsoft.kubernetes/connectedclusters", kubernetesservice, typeFullPath =~ "microsoft.containerregistry/registries", containerregistry, typeFullPath =~ "microsoft.security/connectedcontainerregistries", connectedcontainerregistry, typeFullPath =~ "microsoft.sqlvirtualmachine/sqlvirtualmachines", sqlservervirtualmachines, typeFullPath =~ "microsoft.web/sites", appservices, typeFullPath =~ "microsoft.storage/storageaccounts", storageaccounts, typeFullPath =~ "microsoft.compute/virtualmachinescalesets", virtualmachines, typeFullPath =~ "microsoft.keyvault/vaults", keyvaults, typeFullPath =~ "microsoft.dbforpostgresql/servers", opensourcerelationaldatabases, typeFullPath =~ "microsoft.dbformysql/servers", opensourcerelationaldatabases, typeFullPath =~ "microsoft.dbformariadb/servers", opensourcerelationaldatabases, calculatedSubscriptionPricing)
| extend pricing = case(resourceType =~ "subscription" , calculatedSubscriptionPricing , resourcePricing)
| extend selectedSoftware = ""
| project resourceType, exemptionType, typeFullPath, resourceId, resourceName, subscriptionId, environment, osType, workspaceName, agentMonitoring, assessmentsIdentifier, assessmentsSummary, subscriptionPricing, unhealthyAssessmentsCount, pricing, softwareNamesIdentifier, selectedSoftware
| extend resourceGroup = tolower(tostring(split(resourceId, "/")[4]))
| order by unhealthyAssessmentsCount, subscriptionId, resourceType, resourceId
| where typeFullPath in ('microsoft.compute/virtualmachines', 'microsoft.hybridcompute/machines')
| where isnotempty(resourceId)

content.title: Azure Defender coverage
Machines not sending current heartbeats

content.query:
Heartbeat
| join kind = leftanti (
    Heartbeat
    | where TimeGenerated > now(-15m)
) on SourceComputerId
| summarize arg_max(LatestTimestamp=TimeGenerated, SubscriptionId) by ResourceId
| order by LatestTimestamp
content.title: Agent not reporting for more than 15 minutes
content.noDataMessage: No machines found not reporting for more than 15 minutes.

content.query:
Heartbeat
| join kind = leftanti (
    Heartbeat
    | where TimeGenerated > now(-24h)
) on SourceComputerId
| summarize arg_max(LatestTimestamp=TimeGenerated, SubscriptionId) by ResourceId
| order by LatestTimestamp
content.title: Agent not reporting for more than 24 hours
content.noDataMessage: No machines found not reporting for more than 24 hours.

content.query:
Heartbeat
| join kind = leftanti (
    Heartbeat
    | where TimeGenerated > now(-48h)
) on SourceComputerId
| summarize arg_max(LatestTimestamp=TimeGenerated, SubscriptionId) by ResourceId
| order by LatestTimestamp
content.title: Agent not reporting for more than 48 hours
content.noDataMessage: No machines found not reporting for more than 48 hours.

content.query:
Heartbeat
| join kind = leftanti (
    Heartbeat
    | where TimeGenerated > now(-7d)
) on SourceComputerId
| summarize arg_max(LatestTimestamp=TimeGenerated, SubscriptionId) by ResourceId
| order by LatestTimestamp
content.title: Agent not reporting for more than 7 days
content.noDataMessage: No machines found not reporting for more than 7 days.

| extend sqlservers = case(isnull(subscriptionPricing), '' , subscriptionPricing.sqlservers)
| extend sqlservers = case(sqlservers == 'free', 'off', 'on')
| extend kubernetesservice = case(isnull(subscriptionPricing), '' , subscriptionPricing.kubernetesservice)
| extend kubernetesservice = case(kubernetesservice == 'free', 'off', 'on')
| extend containerregistry = case(isnull(subscriptionPricing), '' , subscriptionPricing.containerregistry)
| extend containerregistry = case(containerregistry == 'free', 'off', 'on')
| extend connectedcontainerregistry = case(isnull(subscriptionPricing), '' , subscriptionPricing.connectedcontainerregistry)
| extend connectedcontainerregistry = case(connectedcontainerregistry == 'free', 'off', 'on')
| extend sqlservervirtualmachines = case(isnull(subscriptionPricing), '' , subscriptionPricing.sqlservervirtualmachines)
| extend sqlservervirtualmachines = case(sqlservervirtualmachines == 'free', 'off', 'on')
| extend appservices = case(isnull(subscriptionPricing), '' , subscriptionPricing.appservices)
| extend appservices = case(appservices == 'free', 'off', 'on')
| extend storageaccounts = case(isnull(subscriptionPricing), '' , subscriptionPricing.storageaccounts)
| extend storageaccounts = case(storageaccounts == 'free', 'off', 'on')
| extend keyvaults = case(isnull(subscriptionPricing), '' , subscriptionPricing.keyvaults)
| extend keyvaults = case(keyvaults == 'free', 'off', 'on')
| extend opensourcerelationaldatabases = case(isnull(subscriptionPricing), '' , subscriptionPricing.opensourcerelationaldatabases)
| extend opensourcerelationaldatabases = case(opensourcerelationaldatabases == 'free', 'off', 'on')
| extend calculatedSubscriptionPricing = case(resourceType =~ "subscription" and isempty(subscriptionPricing) == false , iff(subscriptionPricing has "free" and subscriptionPricing has "standard", "partial", iff(subscriptionPricing has "free", "off", "on")), "")
| extend resourcePricing = case(typeFullPath =~ "microsoft.classiccompute/virtualmachines", virtualmachines, typeFullPath =~ "microsoft.compute/virtualmachines", virtualmachines, typeFullPath =~ "microsoft.hybridcompute/machines", virtualmachines, typeFullPath =~ "microsoft.sql/servers", sqlservers, typeFullPath =~ "microsoft.containerservice/managedclusters", kubernetesservice, typeFullPath =~ "microsoft.kubernetes/connectedclusters", kubernetesservice, typeFullPath =~ "microsoft.containerregistry/registries", containerregistry, typeFullPath =~ "microsoft.security/connectedcontainerregistries", connectedcontainerregistry, typeFullPath =~ "microsoft.sqlvirtualmachine/sqlvirtualmachines", sqlservervirtualmachines, typeFullPath =~ "microsoft.web/sites", appservices, typeFullPath =~ "microsoft.storage/storageaccounts", storageaccounts, typeFullPath =~ "microsoft.compute/virtualmachinescalesets", virtualmachines, typeFullPath =~ "microsoft.keyvault/vaults", keyvaults, typeFullPath =~ "microsoft.dbforpostgresql/servers", opensourcerelationaldatabases, typeFullPath =~ "microsoft.dbformysql/servers", opensourcerelationaldatabases, typeFullPath =~ "microsoft.dbformariadb/servers", opensourcerelationaldatabases, calculatedSubscriptionPricing)
| extend pricing = case(resourceType =~ "subscription" , calculatedSubscriptionPricing , resourcePricing)
| extend selectedSoftware = ""
| project resourceType, exemptionType, typeFullPath, resourceId, resourceName, subscriptionId, environment, osType, workspaceName, agentMonitoring, assessmentsIdentifier, assessmentsSummary, subscriptionPricing, unhealthyAssessmentsCount, pricing, softwareNamesIdentifier, selectedSoftware
| extend resourceGroup = tolower(tostring(split(resourceId, "/")[4]))
| order by unhealthyAssessmentsCount, subscriptionId, resourceType, resourceId
| where typeFullPath in ('microsoft.compute/virtualmachines', 'microsoft.hybridcompute/machines')
| where isnotempty(resourceId)
